hc_add_series for character and factor objects

Source: R/highcharts-api-add.R
hc_add_series.character.Rd

hc_add_series for character and factor objects

# S3 method for character
hc_add_series(hc, data, ...)

# S3 method for factor
hc_add_series(hc, data, ...)

Arguments

hc

A highchart htmlwidget object.
data

A character or factor object.
...

Arguments defined in http://api.highcharts.com/highcharts/chart.
